Class UpdateMemberController

java.lang.Object
edu.ua.cs.cs200.project4.UpdateMemberController
public class UpdateMemberController extends Object
The UpdateMemberController class manages operations related to members in the system.
Author:
Ben Kovakas

    • addMember

      public void addMember(int memberID, String name, String address, String city, String state, int zip, String status) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a new member to the system.
      Parameters:
      memberID - The ID of the member.
      name - The name of the member.
      address - The address of the member.
      city - The city of the member.
      state - The state of the member.
      zip - The ZIP code of the member.
      status - The status of the member.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any input length exceeds the specified limit.

    • editMemberData

      public void editMemberData(int memberID, String newName, String newAddress, String newCity, String newState, int newZip, String newStatus) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Edits the data of an existing member in the system.
      Parameters:
      memberID - The ID of the member to be edited.
      newName - The new name for the member.
      newAddress - The new address for the member.
      newCity - The new city for the member.
      newState - The new state for the member.
      newZip - The new ZIP code for the member.
      newStatus - The new status for the member.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any input length exceeds the specified limit.

    • deleteMember

      public void deleteMember(int memberID)
      Deletes a member from the system.
      Parameters:
      memberID - The ID of the member to be deleted.
